trans-unit.source: Represents a text pattern for which the HTTP transmission is searched.
This class cannot be inherited.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value indicating the zero-based index of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch"></xref> within a group.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Group%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Matches%2A> properties.
A 32-bit signed integer.
The default value is 0, indicating that the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch"></xref> is the first instance within a group.
The property value is negative.
Gets or sets a value indicating the number of groups in which to place the results of the text search.
The value of this property must be less than or equal to the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Repeats%2A> property, or the XML Web service will not compile correctly.
A 32-bit signed integer.
The default value is 1.
The property value is negative.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search should disregard the case of the text to be searched.
`true` if the search should disregard case; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets the collection of text pattern matches that have been found by the search.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatchCollection"></xref> representing the members of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Group"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch"></xref>.
Gets or sets the text pattern for the search.
The value of this property can contain wildcard characters.
A string representing the text for which to search the HTTP transmission.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Gets or sets a value indicating the number of times the search is to be performed.
In a case where more than one match is possible, a property value of 1 will return only the first match found.
A value of <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue> will return all matches.
This property returns the same information as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.RepeatsString%2A> property, but as a 32-bit signed integer rather than as a string.
A 32-bit signed integer.
The default value is 1.
The property value is negative.
Gets or sets a value indicating the number of times the search is to be performed.
This property returns the same information as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch.Repeats%2A> property, but as a string rather than as a 32-bit signed integer.
A value of "*" corresponds to <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.
A string indicating the number of times the search is to be performed.
The default value is "1".
Gets or sets a value indicating the MIME format of the text to be searched.
This property returns an empty string ("") if its value has not been set.
A string indicating the MIME format of the text to be searched.
